name: Last Core
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/last-core/edit

/!\ YOU ARE INVICIBLE TO BULLET, PROTECT THE CORE /!\

You are the last GUARDIAN of the last SUPRA CORE.

As an indestructible defense machine, you have to gain time for the CORE to transfer its DATA to the upmost.

You will survive, not the SUPRA CORE.

Commands (Keyboard) : 

- MOVE = Q/D/Z/S ; LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN arrow key

- SHOOT = MOUSE LEFT CLICK

- RESTART = R
